other_tests.findings: Symmetrical and slightly disorganized base activity; 778 bilateral interictal epileptic discharges (84.1% in the left anterior temporal region and 15.9% in the right anterior temporal region); Six electroclinical seizures recorded (five focal onset impaired awareness motor seizures during awake and one during sleep); all seizures had ictal onset in the left temporal lobe.
Left hippocampus atrophy and right hippocampus malrotation.
Low scores in episodic memory (verbal and non-verbal), language, speech, constructive praxis, and working memory.
Heterozygous mutation in exon 15 of the NSD1 gene [c.5146G>A, p.(Gly1716Arg)], classified as pathologic.
